column1: English: Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge. = Swahili: Protoni zina chaji chanya ya umeme wakati neutroni hazina chaji. Elektroni zina chaji hasi ya umeme. ### English: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty). = Swahili:
column2: Hii inaendana na Norway, Sweden na Nyuzilandi, lakini vinginevyo ni tofauti kabisa (kwa mfano katika Uholanzi takwimu ni moja kwa arobaini).
column3: Hii ni sawa na Norwei, Uswidi na New Zealand, lakini kwa ujumla ni tofauti sana (kwa mfano nchini Uholanzi idadi hii ni moja kwa thelathini).

column1: English: When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic. = Swahili: Wakati kila mmoja katika idadi ya wakazi ni sawa kwa kuzingatia tabia fulani ya maumbile wanajulikana kama wanajinsia moja. ### English: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion. = Swahili:
column2: Ikiwa unatembelea bustani iliyopangwa rasmi, kukusanya “violezo” pia kutakufanya uodolewe, bila majadiliano.
column3: Kama unatembelea shamba la kawaida, kukusanya "maumbile" yanaweza pia kukufanya ukaondolewa, bila kujadiliwa.

column1: English: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). = Swahili: Katika joto la siku, wasafiri wanaweza kuona mazigazi ambayo hutoa dhana ya maji (au vitu vingine). ### English: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. = Swahili:
column2: Maafisa wa mji wa Amsterdam na Makavazi ya Anne Frank wanasema kwamba mti huo umeambukizwa kuvu na unatoa hatari kwa afya ya jamii kwani walisema kwamba ulikuwa katika hatari ya karibu ya kuanguka.
column3: Wataalamu wa jiji la Amsterdam na Jumba la Anne Frank wanasema kuwa mlima huo umepewa na mnyama na kwamba unahatarisha afya ya umma kwa sababu unatishia kuanguka.

column1: English: "We were all simply in shock," the mother stated. = Swahili: "Sisi sote tulikuwa tu katika mshtuko," mamake alisema. ### English: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco. = Swahili:
column2: Wasafiri katika nchi zinazotoza ushuru wa juu wakati mwingine wanaweza kuokoa kiwango kikubwa cha pesa, hasa kwa bidhaa kama vinywaji vyenye vileo na tumbaku.
column3: Waperejea wanaokwenda nchi zenye kodi kubwa wanaweza kuokoa kiasi kikubwa cha fedha, hasa kwa bidhaa kama vile vinywaji baridi na sigara.

column1: English: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy". = Swahili: Kampuni za midia daima hudanganya kuhusu madhumuni ya hili, zikidai kwamba ni kwa “kuzuia uharamu”. ### English: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers. = Swahili:
column2: Danielle Lantagne, mtaalamu wa UN kuhusu ugonjwa huo, alisema kuna uwezekano mkurupuko huo ulisababishwa na walinda amani.
column3: Danielle Lantagne, mtaalamu wa UN kuhusu ugonjwa huo, alisema mlipuko huo ulikuwa huenda ulisababishwa na wanajeshi wa kulinda amani.

column1: English: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain. = Swahili: Sasa kwa Japani. Japani ilikuwa nchi ya kisiwa, kama vile Uingereza. ### English: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream. = Swahili:
column2: Ingawa kiwango cha maji kitaongezeka kwa futi chache tu baada ya mafuriko, maafisa wanatumai kwamba kitatosha kurejesha mafungu ya mchanga yaliyomomonyolewa katika sehemu ya chini ya mto.
column3: Hata kama maji yatapanda kwa sentimeta chache baada ya mafuriko, maafisa wanatumai kwamba yatatosha kurejesha mabaki ya visiwa vidogo vidogo vilivyokuwa vimepotea.

column1: English: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins. = Swahili: Mchezaji ambaye hufanya mipigo michache zaidi, au mizunguko ya rungu, kukamilisha mkondo hushinda. ### English: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members. = Swahili:
column2: Vikundi vidogo vya tamaduni vinaweza kuwa vya kipekee kwa sababu ya umri, kabila, daraja, eneo, na/au jinsia ya washiriki.
column3: Subkultures zinaweza kuwa tofauti kwa sababu ya umri, kabila, jinsia, cheo, au eneo la wanachama.

column1: English: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal. = Swahili: Kimojawapo cha vioo kilivunjika hatimaye, na wakaanza kutoka nje kupitia dirishani," alisema manusura Franciszek Kowal. ### English: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. = Swahili:

column1: English: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. = Swahili: Kwa jumla visa za wanafunzi huwa na mahitaji na utaratibu wa maombi tofauti na visa za kawaida za kitalii au kibiashara. ### English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. = Swahili:
column2: NextGen ni mfumo ambao Utawala wa Shirikisho la Anga unadai ungeruhusu ndege kutumia njia fupi na kuokoa mamilioni ya galoni za mafuta kila mwaka na kukata uzalishaji wa kaboni.
column3: NextGen ni mfumo unaodaiwa na FAA utaruhusu ndege kutua kwenye njia ndefu na kupunguza mamilioni ya lita za mafuta kila mwaka na kupunguza uchafuzi wa kaboni.

column1: English: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. = Swahili: Johnny Reid, dereva mwenza wa timu ya A1GP ya Nyuzilandi, leo ameweka historia kwa kuendesha mbio zaidi katika Daraja la Bandari ya Auckland, Nyuzilandi, lenye miaka 48, kihalali. ### English: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi. = Swahili:
column2: Ripoti za mapema zinasema ndege ilielekezwa tena Afganistani baada ya kunyimwa ruhusa ya kutua katika Urumki.
column3: Ripoti za awali zinaeleza kwamba ndege hiyo ilirudishwa Afghanistan baada ya kutakiwa kutua kwa dharura Ürümqi.

column1: English: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition. = Swahili: Mchezo wa kisasa wa kupigana kwa sime huchezwa kwa viwango vingi, toka wanafunzi wanaosoma katika chuo kikuu hadi mashindano ya kitaalamu na Olimpiki. ### English: Also the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center said that there was no Tsunami indication. = Swahili:
column2: Pia, Kituo cha Onyo ya Tsunami cha Pasifiki kilisema kuwa hakukuwa na dalili ya Tsunami.
column3: Pia kituo cha tahadhari ya tsunami ya Pasifiki kilisema hakuna ishara ya tsunami.

column1: English: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. column1: English: Attention Deficit Disorder "is a neurological syndrome whose classic defining triad of symptoms including impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or excess energy". = Swahili: Tatizo la Upungufu wa Umakini "ni ugonjwa wa neva ambao dalili zake tatu za kawaida za kuufafanua ni msukumo, mvurugo na utendaji wa kupita kiasi au nguvu za ziada." ### English: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. = Swahili:

column1: English: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November. = Swahili: Waandamanaji wanatumaini kukusanya ombi lenye saini milioni 1.2 ili kuliwasilisha kwenye Kongamano la Kitaifa mnamo Novemba. ### English: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon". = Swahili:

column1: English: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal. = Swahili: Kimojawapo cha vioo kilivunjika hatimaye, na wakaanza kutoka nje kupitia dirishani," alisema manusura Franciszek Kowal. ### English: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years. = Swahili:

column1: English: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. = Swahili: Upigaji picha za wanyamapori mara nyingi huchukuliwa kwa urahisi, lakini kama upigaji picha kwa ujumla, picha ina thamani ya maneno elfu. ### English: The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. = Swahili:

column1: English: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. = Swahili: Victoria Falls ni mji ulioko katika sehemu ya magharibi mwa Zimbabwe, kuvuka mpaka kutoka Livingstone, ya Zambia, na karibu na Botswana. ### English: Thousands of years ago, a man called Aristarchus said that the Solar System moved around the Sun. = Swahili:
column2: Maelfu ya miaka iliyopita, mwanamume aliyeitwa Aristarchus alisema kwamba Mfumo wa Jua ulizunguka Jua.
column3: Miaka kadhaa iliyopita, mtu mmoja alimwita Aristarchus na kusema kuwa mfumo wa Jua linapita Jua.

column1: English: Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours. = Swahili: Tufani hung’oa miti, kupasua mbao kutoka kwa majengo, na kurusha magari juu angani. Asilimia mbili ya tufani zenye vurugu zaidi hudumu kwa zaidi ya saa tatu. ### English: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity. = Swahili:
column2: Kila mtu anaweza kupata uelewa. Kitu kimoja kinachosimama njiani mwa lengo hili ni wasiwasi na uhasi wetu wenyewe.
column3: Watu wote wanaweza kufikia ufahamu. Kitu pekee kinachobaki ni matatizo yetu wenyewe na chuki.

column1: English: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. = Swahili: Mawakili maarufu wa Ugiriki, Sakis Kechagiogluo na George Nikolakopoulos wametiwa korokoroni katika jela ya Athens ya Korydallus, kwani walipatikana na hatia ya kula rushwa na ufisadi. ### English: Why would an organization want to go through the time consuming process of establishing a learning organization? One goal for putting organizational learning concepts into practice is innovation. = Swahili:
column2: Kwa nini shirika lipitie mchakato wa muda mrefu ili kuanzisha shirika la mafunzo? Lengo moja la kuanzisha dhana za shirika la mafunzo katika matendo ni uvumbuzi.
column3: Kwa nini shirika lingine lingeomba kuendeshwa kupitia mchakato usiotabirika wa kuanzisha taasisi ya kujifunza? Moja ya malengo ya kuutumia mbinu za kujifunza kwa taasisi ni ubunifu.

column1: English: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture. = Swahili: Picha inayofuata inaonyesha atomu zikitoa fotoni. column1: English: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November. = Swahili: Waandamanaji wanatumaini kukusanya ombi lenye saini milioni 1.2 ili kuliwasilisha kwenye Kongamano la Kitaifa mnamo Novemba. ### English: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. = Swahili:

column1: English: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. = Swahili: Katika London, takribani watu 200 waliandamana nje ya ofisi za baadhi ya wenye hakimiliki. ### English: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. column1: English: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. = Swahili: Jela la Abu Ghraib la Iraki limewashwa moto wakati wa ghasia. ### English: Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. = Swahili:

column1: English: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. column1: English: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. = Swahili: Maonyesho ya Kimataifa ya Maua ni matukio maalum ambayo huonyesha maonyesho ya maua, bustani za mimea na kitu chochote kingine kinachohusisha mimea. ### English: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour. = Swahili:

column1: English: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold. = Swahili: Majengo mengi ni mazuri sana kutazama na mtazamo kutoka kwa jengo refu au kutoka kwa dirisha lililowekwa kwa ujanja unaweza kuwa uzuri wa ajabu. ### English: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man). = Swahili:

column1: English: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. = Swahili: Wasafiri wengi wenye uwezo wameshindwa na upya wa usafiri wa ulimwengu unaokua, ambapo marekebisho mengi madogo ya kitamaduni yanaweza kuongezeka haraka. ### English: Everything in the Universe is made of matter. All matter is made of tiny particles called atoms. = Swahili:

column1: English: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism. = Swahili: Seli ni sehemu ndogo ya kimuundo na ya kazi ya viumbe (vitu) hai. ### English: Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. = Swahili:

column1: English: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. = Swahili: Ruwaza hiyo inapaswa kuwa na kina kirefu, milimita 5 (inchi 1/5) au zaidi, na nyenzo laini za kutosha katika hali ya baridi. ### English: Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies. = Swahili:

column1: English: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. = Swahili: Baadhi ya buti zina hazama na kuna zana za nyongeza zilizo na hazama kwa hali telezi, zinazofaa kwa viatu na buti nyingi, kwa kisigino au kisigino na wayo. ### English: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. = Swahili:

column3: Katika mwaka wa 2002, Goma iliharibiwa na lava kutoka kwa volkano ya Nyiragongo, ambayo iliharibu barabara nyingi za mji, hasa katikati ya mji.

column1: English: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan. = Swahili: Ustaarabu wa Indus Valley ulikuwa wa Enzi za Shaba kaskazini magharibi mwa bara ndogo la Hindi, ukijumuisha kwa wingi Pakistani ya sasa na sehemu za kaskazini magharibi mwa Hindu na kaskazini magharibi mwa Afganistani. ### English: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. = Swahili:

column1: English: He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. = Swahili: Alikuwa akikaa kwenye hoteli ya timu mbele ya mechi iliyopangiwa Jumapili dhidi ya Bolania. ### English: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. column1: English: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. = Swahili: Njia ilio rahisi kuanza biashara ya uandishi wa usafiri ni kuonyeshana ujuzi wako kwenye tovuti ya blogu ya usafiri iliyo imara. ### English: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material. = Swahili:

column1: English: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. column1: English: Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport. = Swahili: Kudumisha uwiano bora wa kawi, kuwa na mazoea ya unywaji wa maji yenye ufanisi, na kuelewa vipengele tofauti vya mazoea ya ziada kunaweza kusaidia wanariadha kuboresha utendaji wao na kuongeza raha yao katika spoti hiyo. ### English: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home. = Swahili:

column1: English: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s. = Swahili: Ingawa baadhi ya wasomi hukisia kwamba kwa sababu ustaarabu pia ulikuwapo katika mabonde ya Mto Sarasvati uliokauka sasa, unafaa kuitwa Ustaarabu wa Indus-Sarasvati, huku wengine wakiuita Ustaarabu wa Harappa, kutokana na Harappa, eneo lake la kwanza kuchimbwa katika miaka ya 1920. ### English: To understand the Templars one must understand the context that prompted the creation of the order. = Swahili:

column1: English: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area. = Swahili: Kurusha kidege-roboti karibu na uwanja wa ndege juu ya umati wa watu ni wazo mbaya karibu kila wakati, hata kama si haramu katika eneo lako. ### English: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. = Swahili:

column1: English: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. = Swahili: Kuishi na kujitolea katika nchi ya kigeni ni njia bora ya kupata kujua utamaduni mpya, kukutana na watu wapya, kujifunza juu yako mwenyewe, kupata hisia za mtazamo na hata kupata ujuzi mpya. ### English: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. = Swahili:

column3: Kiashiria cha televisheni, kifaa hiki hutumia viini mbili vilivyowekwa karibu na televisheni ya mtumiaji ili kuitambua kwa kutumia mwelekeo wa kizio cha tatu.

column1: English: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. = Swahili: Isipokuwa kama wewe ni mwanadiplomasia, kufanya kazi ughaibuni kwa jumla humaanisha kwamba utalazimika kufaili ushuru wa mapato nchini uliko. ### English: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people. = Swahili:

column1: English: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. = Swahili: Baada ya kuwa dhahiri kwamba familia nyingi zilikuwa zinatafuta usaidizi wa kisheria kupigana na ufukuzwaji, mkutano ulifanywa mnamo Machi 20 katika Kituo cha Sheria cha Jamii cha East Bay kwa waathirika wa utapeli wa makazi. ### English: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today. = Swahili:

column1: English: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. = Swahili: Pittman alipendekeza kwamba hali hazingeboreka hadi wakati fulani wiki ijayo. ### English: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. = Swahili:

column1: English: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. = Swahili: Kisha Kimbunga ya Daveshi ikachukua jukua. ### English: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885. = Swahili:

column1: English: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. = Swahili: Kwa sababu simu hupitishwa kwenye intaneti, huhitaji kutumia kampuni ya simu iliyo mahali unakoishi au unakosafiri. ### English: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands. = Swahili:

column1: English: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices. = Swahili: Tayari likiripoti kwa Kiingereza na Kijapani, shirika la kimataifa linazindua mipango ya lugha za Kihispania, Kiitaliano, na Kikorea, kwa televisheni, wavuti, na vifaa vya mkononi. ### English: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections. = Swahili:

column1: English: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. = Swahili: Saa 11 dakika 20, polisi waliwataka waandamanaji warudi nyuma kando ya barabara, wakisema kwamba walihitaji kusawazisha haki ya kuandamana na msongamano wa magari. ### English: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. = Swahili:
column2: Tangu Serikali ya Shirikisho ilipoingilia kati kuhusu ufadhili wa hospitali ya Mersey katika Davenport, Tasmania, serikali ya jimbo na baadhi ya wabunge wa shirikisho wameshutumu kitendo hiki kama sarakasi kabla ya uchaguzi wa kishirika utakaofanyika mnamo Novemba.
column3: Kuanzia siku moja baada ya Serikali kuu kuingilia kutatua mgogoro wa hospitali ya Mersey huko Devonport, Tasmania, serikali ya jimbo na baadhi ya wabunge wa bunge la kitaifa wameikosoa hatua hii kama stori ya preludio ya uchaguzi mkuu wa kitaifa utakaofanyika Novemba.

column1: English: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia. = Swahili: Katika miaka ya mwisho ya karne ya 18 Wavietinamu pia waliivamia Kambodia. ### English: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. = Swahili:
column2: Wakati wa Vita vya Mapinduzi, majimbo kumi na matatu kwanza yaliunda serikali dhaifu ya kati – huku Bunge la Marekani likiwa ndiyo sehemu yake pekee – chini ya Vifungu vya Shirikisho.
column3: Wakati wa Vita vya Mapinduzi, nchi 13 za kwanza zilianzisha serikali kuu dhaifu yenye Congress kuwa moja ya viungo vyake chini ya Mkataba wa Muungano.

column1: English: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle. = Swahili: Ujenzi wa ghorofa tano mpya unaendelea katika eneo, na kituo cha usafirishaji na mbuga ya ukumbusho zikiwa katikati. ### English: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. = Swahili:

column1: English: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. = Swahili: Leslie Aun, msemaji wa Shirika la Komen, alisema kuwa shirika hilo lilipitisha sheria mpya ambayo hairuhusu ruzuku au ufadhili kutolewa kwa mashirika ambayo yanafanyiwa upelelezi wa kisheria. ### English: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany. = Swahili:

column1: English: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. = Swahili: Wakati wapangaji walianza kusumulia yaliyowatendekea, familia nyingi husika ziligundua kuwa Carolyn Wilson wa shirika la OHA aliiba amana yao na kutoweka mjini. ### English: Liggins followed in his father’s footsteps and entered a career in medicine. = Swahili:

These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. = Swahili:
column2: Kila mwaka, dazeni za wageni huumia kwa sababu hawakuzingatia umbali unaofaa. Wanyama hawa ni wakubwa, wa mwitu, na uwezekano wa kuwa hatari, kwa hivyo wape nafasi yao.

column1: English: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. = Swahili: Wakati wa miongo mitatu iliyopita, licha ya kubaki kuwa jimbo la kikomunisti, China imekuza uchumi wa soko. ### English: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly. = Swahili:
column2: Kampuni za ndege zinajua vizuri kwamba kuna kundi fulani la ndani la wasafiri ambao wako tayari kulipa pesa nyingi kwa haki ya kufika mahali kwa haraka na kwa starehe, na wanabadilisha ipasavyo.
column3: Wasambazaji wa ndege wanaelewa vizuri kuwa kuna kundi fulani la wasafiri wanaotaka kulipa fedha nyingi kwa ajili ya kupata haki ya kusafiri haraka na kwa usafi, na hivyo wanalipa fedha nyingi.

column1: English: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. = Swahili: Baadhi ya programu-tumizi katika kategoria hii zinaweza hata kutafsiri matini ya lugha za kigeni kwenye vibao vya ishara au vitu vingine katika dunia halisi wakati mtumiaji anapoelekeza simu maizi kwenye vitu hivyo. ### English: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others. = Swahili:
column2: Hospitali imefuata itifaki ya kudhibiti maambukizi, ikiwa ni pamoja na kutenga mgonjwa kutoka kwa wengine ili kuzuia uwezekano wa kuwaambukiza wengine.
column3: Hospitali imefuata utaratibu wa kudhibiti maambukizi, ikiwemo kuwazuia wagonjwa wengine ili kuzuia uwezekano wa kuambukizwa kwa wengine.

column1: English: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge. = Swahili: Kwa hivyo wengi wetu hujipata tukitazama kipindi cha runinga ambacho hutujulisha kuhusu mchakato au uzoefu ambao hatutawahi kushiriki au kutumia maarifa hayo. ### English: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants." = Swahili:

column1: English: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen. = Swahili: Wathai walivamia Kambodia mara kadhaa katika karne ya 18 na mnamo 1772 wakaangamiza Phnom Phen. ### English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. = Swahili:

column3: Kama nchi unayopanga kutembelea itafikiwa na tahadhari ya safari, bima yako ya afya ya safari au bima yako ya kukatiza safari inaweza kuathiriwa.

column1: English: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces. = Swahili: Inasemekana kwamba mnamo 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel aliunda ngome hiyo kama ukumbusho wa ushindi wake dhidi ya vikosi vya Tibeti na Mongoli. ### English: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey. = Swahili:
column2: Njia pana, majengo yenye vioo sehemu za mbele na vituo vya kisasa vya kibiashara vimejaa paa za vigae vyekundu vya jadi, soko la karne ya 18, misikiti na makanisa ya zamani, ingawa jiji lenyewe lina anga ya Uropa kuliko Uturuki ya jadi.
column3: Mabonde marefu, majengo ya kioo na maduka ya kisasa yanatembelewa na nyumba za rangi ya machungwa, soko la karne ya 18, na misikiti na makanisa ya zamani, ingawa mji huo una mwenendo wa zaidi ya Ulaya ya Mashariki kuliko ya Uturuki ya kiasili.

column1: English: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. = Swahili: Saa 11 dakika 20, polisi waliwataka waandamanaji warudi nyuma kando ya barabara, wakisema kwamba walihitaji kusawazisha haki ya kuandamana na msongamano wa magari. ### English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris. = Swahili:
column2: Watafiti kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton katika Marekani na Chuo Kikuu cha Uppsala katika Uswidi waliripoti spishi hiyo mpya iligeuka katika vizazi viwili pekee, ingawa mchakato huu ulikuwa unaaminika kuchukua muda mrefu zaidi, kwa sababu ya kuzaana kati ya wenyeji shorewanda wa Darwin, Geospiza fortes , na wahamiaji shorewanda wa dungusi kakati, Geospiza conirostris.
column3: Watafiti kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton nchini Marekani na Chuo Kikuu cha Uppsala nchini Uswidi waliripoti kuwa spishi mpya ilitokea katika kizazi kimoja tu, ingawa mchakato huu ulikuwa umehisiwa kuchukua muda mrefu zaidi, kutokana na ngono kati ya ndege wa Darwin, Geospiza fortes, na ndege wa cactus, Geospiza conirostris.

column1: English: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year. = Swahili: Miaka 250 baadaye, Guinness imekua kuwa biashara ya kimataifa ambayo hupata mauzo ya yuro bilioni 10 (dola bilioni 14.7 za Marekani) kila mwaka. ### English: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village. = Swahili:

column1: English: An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. = Swahili: Afisa wa kampuni ya gesi alikuwa anaripoti mahali pa tukio baada ya jirani kupiga simu kuhusu uvujaji wa gesi. ### English: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. = Swahili:

column1: English: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce. = Swahili: Nadia, aliyezaliwa mnamo 17 Septemba 2007, kupitia upasuaji wa sehemu ya Cesarean katika kliniki ya uzazi katika Aleisk, Urusi, alikuwa na uzito mkubwa wa pauni 17 na aunsi 1. ### English: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. = Swahili:

column1: English: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. = Swahili: Manowari hizi ziliongozwa na Olaf Trygvasson, Mnorwei aliye na matarajio ya kurudisha nchi yake kutoka kwa utawala wa Kidenmaki. ### English: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. = Swahili:

column1: English: If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. = Swahili: Ikiwa utatembelea mji wa Greenland wakati wa msimu wa baridi (ukizingatia kuwa jinsi unavyokwenda kaskazini ndivyo inavyozidi kuwa baridi), ni muhimu kuleta mavazi ya kutosha ya joto. ### English: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle. = Swahili:

column1: English: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. = Swahili: Tukio hilo la kisanaa pia ni sehemu ya kampeni ya Bucharest City Hall ambayo ina lengo la kuzindua taswira ya mji huo mkuu wa Romania kama jiji bunifu la kusisimua. ### English: All these things and more highlight Ontario as what is considered quintessentially Canadian by outsiders. = Swahili:

column1: English: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. = Swahili: Orodha ya wenyeji wanaopatikana hutolewa kwa kuchapishwa kwenye nakala na/au mitandaoni, wakati mwingine pamoja na marejeleo na hakiki kutoka kwa wasafiri wengine. ### English: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. = Swahili:

column1: English: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light. = Swahili: Ili kurejea katika hali yao ya awali ya nishati, ni lazima ziondoe nishati ya ziada zilizopata kutoka kwa mwangaza. ### English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out). = Swahili:

column1: English: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server. = Swahili: Sheria ya Huduma za Utangazaji huruhusu udhibiti wa maudhui ya Intaneti, hata hivyo ili kuchukuliwa kuwa maudhui ya intaneti, ni lazima yawe kwenye seva. ### English: U.S. President George W. column1: English: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. = Swahili: Tangu kuanzishwa kwake, Onion imekuwa milki halisi ya habari za dhihaka, ikiwa na toleo la chapa, tovuti ambayo iliwavutia wageni 5,000,000 wa kipekee katika mwezi wa Oktoba, matangazo ya kibinafsi, mtandao wa habari wa saa 24, podikasti, na atlasi ya dunia iliyozinduliwa hivi majuzi inayoitwa Our Dumb World. ### English: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication. = Swahili:
column2: Mtandao unachanganya vitu vya mawasiliano ya kundi la watu na ya kati ya mtu na mtu.

column1: English: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. = Swahili: Felicia, iliyokuwa kwa wakati mmoja dhoruba ya Kategoria ya 4kwenye kiwango cha Vimbunga cha Saffir- Simpson, ilidhoofika hadi unyongovu wa kitropiki kabla ya kufifia Jumanne. ### English: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. = Swahili:
column2: Pamoja na kutofikika kwake kwa wastani, “Timbuktu” imekuja kutumika kama sitiari ya nchi za kigeni zilizo mbali sana.
column3: Kwa pamoja na kuwa mbali na eneo hilo, "Timbuktu" imekuwa ikitumika kama kiasili ya kiasili kwa nchi za mbali.

column1: English: Followers pursue certain ways of living, or practices that are intended to nurture those experiences. = Swahili: Wafuasi hutafuta njia fulani za kuishi, au mazoea ambayo yanakusudiwa kulea uzoefu huo. ### English: All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic. = Swahili:

column1: English: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge. = Swahili: Kwa hivyo wengi wetu hujipata tukitazama kipindi cha runinga ambacho hutujulisha kuhusu mchakato au uzoefu ambao hatutawahi kushiriki au kutumia maarifa hayo. ### English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. = Swahili:

column1: English: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place. = Swahili: Mawingu yalitoa uwezekano wa mkanganyiko kuhusu kama mlipuko halisi ulifanyika. ### English: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. = Swahili:
column2: Uliokuwa mji wa kale wa Smyma, sasa ni wa kisasa, ulioendelea, na wa kibiashara wenye shughuli nyingi, ulioewekwa kuzunguka kituo kikubwa na umezungukwa na milima.
column3: Mara ya zamani ilikuwa mji wa Smyrna, sasa ni mji wa kisasa, ulioendelezwa na wenye shughuli nyingi, uliojengwa katika bahari kubwa na umezungukwa na milima.

column1: English: If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. = Swahili: Ikiwa utatembelea mji wa Greenland wakati wa msimu wa baridi (ukizingatia kuwa jinsi unavyokwenda kaskazini ndivyo inavyozidi kuwa baridi), ni muhimu kuleta mavazi ya kutosha ya joto. ### English: Everyone participates in society and uses transportation systems. Almost everyone complains about transportation systems. = Swahili:
column2: Kila mtu hushiriki katika jamii na kutumia mifumo ya uchukuzi. Karibu kila mtu hulalamika kuhusu mifumo ya uchukuzi.
column3: Watu wote huungana na jamii na hutumia mfumo wa usafiri. Wengi huzungumzia mfumo wa usafiri.

column1: English: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay. = Swahili: Pasipoti yako lazima iwe halali kwa angalau miezi 6 zaidi ya tarehe zako za kusafiri. Tikiti ya safari ya kwenda na kurudi/kuendelea inahitajika ili kudhibitisha urefu wa kukaa kwako. ### English: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population. = Swahili:
column2: Kwa muda, jinsi idadi mpya inavyoanza kuzoea mazingira yao mapya, wanaanza kuonekana zaidi na zaidi tofauti na idadi ile nyingine.
column3: Kwa muda mrefu, wakati watu wapya wanapoanza kuikabili mazingira yao mapya, wanakuwa na tabia tofauti na watu wa jamii nyingine.

column1: English: French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. = Swahili: Sheria ya Ufaransa ilibadilishwa. Uanaharakati wake ukarudi nyuma kwa miaka 15 ambapo alijiunga na Upinzani wa Ufaransa wakati wa Vita vya Dunia vya II. ### English: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate. = Swahili:
column2: Chaguo zingine za midundobayolojia huhusisha unywaji mwingi (hususan wa maji au chai, dawa maarufu) kabla ya kulala, hali inayomlazimu mtu kuamka ili kwenda haja ndogo.
column3: Wengine wa mapendekezo ya biorhythm yanahusisha kunywa maji mengi (kususani maji au chai, dawa inayojulikana kama diuretiki) kabla ya kulala, kuamuru mtu aingie ili aonekane.

column1: English: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets. = Swahili: Serikali ya awali ya kihafidhina ya Australia ilikataa kuridhia Kyoto, ikisema ingeharibu uchumi kwa utegemeaji wake mkubwa wa uuzaji nje wa makaa-mawe, wakati nchi kama India na China hazikufungwa na malengo ya uzalishaji wa vichafuzi. ### English: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. = Swahili:
column2: Wachezaji wa juu katika mashindano, Afrika Kusini, walianza vizuri walipowashinda Zambia walio katika nafasi ya 5 kwa 26 - 00 kwa urahisi.
column3: Washindi wa mashindano wa kwanza, Afrika Kusini walianza kwa ushindi mzuri wa 26 - 00 dhidi ya washindi wa tano Zambia.

column1: English: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. = Swahili: Arias alipima chanya kwa kesi ndogo ya virusi, Waziri wa Rais Rodrigo Arias alisema. ### English: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. = Swahili:
column2: Wakati wa uteuzi wa 1976, alimshauri Carter kuhusu sera ya nje, kisha akafanya kazi kama Mshauri wa Usalama wa Kitaifa (NSA) kutoka 1977 hadi 1981, na alichukua hatamu kutoka kwa Henry Kissinger.
column3: Katika uchaguzi wa mwaka 1976, alisaidia Carter katika masuala ya kigeni, kisha akawa mshauri wa Usalama wa Taifa (NSA) kuanzia mwaka 1977 hadi 1981, akichukua nafasi ya Henry Kissinger.

column1: English: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. = Swahili: Habari zilienea katika jamii ya Red Lake leo wakati mazishi ya Jeff Weisse na watatu kati ya waathiriwa tisa yalifanywa kwamba mwanafunzi mwingine alikamatwa kuhusiana na upigaji risasi kwenye shule mnamo 21 Machi. ### English: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans. = Swahili:
column2: Kutumia meli kusafirisha bidhaa kwa kiasi kikubwa ilikuwa njia bora zaidi ya kusafirisha halaiki ya watu na bidhaa nyingi baharini.
column3: Kuunganisha meli ili kusafirisha bidhaa ni njia bora zaidi ya kusafirisha idadi kubwa ya watu na bidhaa kwa umbali wa bahari.

column1: English: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such. = Swahili: Ikiwa unapanga kukaa kambini, beba kitanda kidogo cha kambini au kitanda cha bembea ili ujiepushe na nyoka, nge na vitu kama hivyo. ### English: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. = Swahili:

column1: English: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk. = Swahili: Triseratops angeutumia mdomo wake wenye nguvu kuyatoa majani kabla ya kula shina. ### English: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. = Swahili:

column1: English: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today". = Swahili: Wakati wa hotuba yake ya masaa 2, alisema kwamba "Leo Kampuni la Tofaa itaandaa tena simu hiyo, Tutafanya historia leo". ### English: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. = Swahili:

column3: Mto wa Amazonas ni mto wa pili mrefu na mkubwa zaidi duniani. Unamwaga maji zaidi ya mara 8 kuliko mto wa pili mkubwa.

column1: English: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. = Swahili: Rubani alitambuliwa kama Kiongozi wa Kikosi Dilokrit Pattavee. ### English: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat. = Swahili:

column1: English: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”. = Swahili: Mwaka wa 1977, Dak. column2: katika maeneo ya bara la Kaskazini mwa India na Pakistani, mtindi kwa kawaida hutumiwa katika mchuzi wenye viungo; Katika Kusini mwa India na mikoa mingine ya pwani ya bara ndogo, maziwa ya nazi hutumiwa sana.
column3: Katika maeneo ya ndani ya India Kaskazini na Pakistan, yoghurt hutumika sana katika curries; katika Kusini mwa India na baadhi ya maeneo ya pwani ya nchi hiyo, maziwa ya coco hutumika sana.

column1: English: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. = Swahili: Muda mfupi baadaye, Jarida la Atlanta-Katiba lilichapisha ripoti kuonyesha shida za matokeo ya vipimo. ### English: These theories suggest that people have certain needs and/or desires which have been internalized as they mature to adulthood. = Swahili:

column1: English: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. = Swahili: Ni mashirika machache tu ya ndege ambayo bado hutoa nauli ya kufiwa, ambayo hupunguza kidogo gharama ya kusafiri kwa mazishi dakika ya mwisho. ### English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters. = Swahili:

column1: English: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. = Swahili: Ikiwa kupiga picha ya kitu tu hakuruhusiwi, basi hupaswi hata kufikiria kurekodi video yake. ### English: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. column1: English: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. column1: English: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. = Swahili: Jihadhari: Baa za mji mdogo hapa sio mahali pazuri kwa mgeni wa nje ya nchi kutangamana. ### English: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. = Swahili:

column1: English: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. = Swahili: Diva wa Uturuki Sezen Aksu aliigiza pamoja na mwimbaji wa sauti mwembamba wa kiume, Alessandro Safina wa Italia pamoja na mwimbaji wa Ugiriki Haris Alexiou. ### English: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day. = Swahili:

column1: English: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. = Swahili: Fikiria, ukitaka, Mmankunia, Mbostonia, Mjamaika, na Msydney wakiwa wameketi wamezunguka meza wakila chajio mkahawani katika Toronto. ### English: It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. = Swahili:

column1: English: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year. = Swahili: Miaka 250 baadaye, Guinness imekua kuwa biashara ya kimataifa ambayo hupata mauzo ya yuro bilioni 10 (dola bilioni 14.7 za Marekani) kila mwaka. ### English: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. = Swahili:

column1: English: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. = Swahili: Ikiwa unao wakati wa ziada wa kusafiri, angalia uone jinsi ankarakifani yako ya jumla ya nauli kwenda Afrika inalingana na nauli ya kuuzunguka ulimwengu. ### English: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011. = Swahili:

column1: English: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. = Swahili: Wakati kibonge kitakapofika Duniani na kuingia kwenye angahewa, takriban saa 11 asubuhi (saa za mashariki), kinatarajiwa kutoa onyesho lenye mwangaza kwa wakaaji wa California Kaskazini, Oregon, Nevada na Utah. ### English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night. = Swahili:

column3: Hii inamaanisha unaweza kutembelea jiji hili la kihistoria kwa siku mbili kamili wakati ukirudi na kulala kwenye meli usiku.

column1: English: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. = Swahili: Michezo ya Boga, karate na kujiririka ilijaribu kuingia kwenye ratiba ya olimpiki vilevile mpira wa chini na mpira laini, ambayo ilitolewa katika Michezo ya Olimpiki mwaka wa 2005. ### English: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!" = Swahili:

column1: English: The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking. = Swahili: Mkono na mguu wa sokwe ni sawa kwa ukubwa na urefu, kuonyesha matumizi ya mkono kwa kubeba uzito katika kutembea kwa konzi. ### English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. column1: English: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production. = Swahili: Hili linaendelea kuwa suala lisilo la muhimu jinsi watengenezaji wa lenzi wanavyofikia viwango vya juu katika uzalizaji wa lenzi. ### English: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment. = Swahili:

column1: English: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. = Swahili: Fred hivi sasa ina upepo wa maili 105 kwa saa (kilomita 165 kwa saa) na inaelekea kaskazini magharibi. ### English: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn. = Swahili:

column1: English: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp". = Swahili: Kwa kifupi, kutumia gari lako ni njia mwafaka ya safari za barabarani lakini nadra kwa gari lenyewe kuwa njia ya “kupiga kambi”. ### English: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples. = Swahili:

column1: English: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism. = Swahili: Hata hivyo, mnamo Juni 1956, ahadi za Kruschev ziliwekwa katika jaribio wakati maandamano katika Polandi, ambapo wafanyakazi walikuwa wakipinga upungufu wa chakula na kukatwa kwa mishahara, yaligeuka kuwa maandamano ya jumla dhidi ya Ukomunisti. ### English: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. = Swahili:

column1: English: Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains). = Swahili: Ni wanyama tu walio na bongo (ingawa hata si wanyama wote walio nazo; kwa mfano, viwavi wa baharini hawana bongo). ### English: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. = Swahili:

column1: English: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. = Swahili: Hii inaweza kufanywa kwenye gari la kawaida kwa mipango makini lakini inapendekezwa sana gari la 4 kwa 4 na sehemu nyingi zinaweza kufikika tu kwa gari la 4 kwa 4 lenye magurudumu mapana. ### English: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. = Swahili:

column3: Kampuni za usafirishaji zina malipo mazuri kwa kusafirisha vitu haraka. Mara nyingi muda ni muhimu sana kwa nyaraka za biashara, bidhaa au spare parts kwa ajili ya kurekebisha tatizo linalohitaji kutatuliwa haraka.

column1: English: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. = Swahili: Kuna mambo mengi sana unayofaa kutilia maanani kabla na wakati wa kusafiri mahali. ### English: This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start. = Swahili:

column3: Hapa ni mahali ambapo Wazungu walipochukua kama ardhi yao na kwa hiyo kama una nia ya kutafuta ushahidi wa historia ya ukoloni wa eneo hili, hapa ni mahali ambapo unaweza kuanza.

column1: English: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. = Swahili: Alipata sifa za kisiasa wakati wa muda wake Atlanta na alitambuliwa kwa elimu bunifu ya mjini. ### English: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down. = Swahili:

column1: English: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. = Swahili: Katika ripoti yake ya kila mwezi ya hivi karibuni, Shirika la Nchi Zinazosafirisha nje Petroli ilisema mauzo ya nje ya ghafi yamepungua sana kwa miongo miwili kwa mapipa milioni 2.8 kwa siku. ### English: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2. = Swahili:

column3: Kuana aspect ratio ya muundo huu (kwa kuigawa kwa kumi na mbili ili kupata muundo rahisi zaidi) ni 3:2.

column1: English: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained. = Swahili: Udhibiti wa ardhi wa Urusi uliamsha jeti na mtazamo wa kawaida wa kituo ulipatikana tena. ### English: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. = Swahili:

column1: English: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. = Swahili: Bw. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. = Swahili:

column1: English: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars. = Swahili: Kwa jambo moja, kaskazini mwa New Meksiko mna shida kubwa ya uendeshaji gari kwa ulevi, na idadi kubwa ya madereva walevi iko karibu sana na baa za miji midogo. ### English: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. = Swahili:
column2: Nyingi za monasteri hutoa kanga kwa wanawake wanaokuja bila, lakini ukija na kanga yako, haswa iliyo na rangi kali, utapata tabasamu kutoka kwa monaki au sista kwenye kiingilio.
column3: Mara nyingi monasteri zote zinawapa mavazi ya kubana wanawake waliochoka, lakini kama una mavazi yako mwenyewe, hasa yenye rangi za kuvutia, utapata mwamko kutoka kwa mmonaki au mmonaki wa kike kwenye lango la kuingilia.

column1: English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. = Swahili: Mwanzoni mwa vita zilisonga mara nyingi juu ya bahari, lakini kadiri rada ilivyoanza kukua na kupata usahihi zaidi nyambizi zililazimika kuzama chini ya maji ili kuepuka kuonekana. ### English: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. = Swahili:
column2: Mkoa huo umefungwa na Saheli katika upande wa kaskazini, na umefungwa na Bahari ya Atlantiki katika upande wa kusini na magharibi.
column3: Kaskazi iko pembeni ya jangwa la Sahel, na kusini na magharibi iko Bahari ya Atlantiki.

column1: English: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success. = Swahili: Baada ya vipingamizi vya kwanza vya kijeshi, Ethelred aliweza kukubaliana kimasharti na Olaf, ambaye alirudi Norwe ili kujaribu kupata ufalme wake, kwa mafanikio mseto. ### English: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately. = Swahili:
column2: Oliver Sacks, katika gazeti lake Hotuba ya Rais, alionyesha namna watu ambao hawawezi kuelewa hotuba kutokana na uharibifu wa ubongo hata hivyo wana uwezo kwa kutathmini ukweli kwa usahihi.
column3: Oliver Sacks, katika makala yake The President's Speech, alionyesha jinsi watu ambao hawawezi kuelewa hotuba kwa sababu ya majeraha ya ubongo, bado wanaweza kuutafuta ukweli kwa usahihi.

column1: English: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness. = Swahili: Mazoea ya lishe sahihi pekee haiwezi kuzalisha usomi wa utendaji, ila yanaweza kuathiri kwa kiasi kikubwa na ustawi wa wakimbiaji wachanga kwa ujumla. ### English: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. = Swahili:

column1: English: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack. = Swahili: Kwa hali yoyote, ni meli chache sana za jeshi la kifalme zilizo karibu na njia za uvamizi kwa sababu wanahofia kusamishwa na mashambulizi ya hewa ya Kijerumani. ### English: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country. = Swahili:
column2: Katika hali nyingi, kujisajilisha kwa kozi mwaka-pengo ughaibuni kwa hakika kunaweza kuboresha nafasi zako za kuendeleza elimu ya juu katika nchi yako.

column1: English: The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. column1: English: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. = Swahili: San Francisko imekuza miundombinu kubwa ya watalii ambayo ni hoteli mikahawa, na vifaa vingi, vya kongamano vya hali ya juu. ### English: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs. = Swahili:

column1: English: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. = Swahili: Sehemu ya Uturuki, pamoja na maziwa, imekalia kilomita mraba 783, 562 (maili mraba 300, 948), ambazo kilomita mraba 755,688 (maili mraba 291,773) kati yake ziko kusini magharibi mwa Asia na kilomita mraba 23,764 (maili mraba 9,174) ziko barani Ulaya. ### English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese. = Swahili:
column2: Matangazo ya mara kwa mara katika Metro hufanywa tu kwa Kitalani, lakini usumbufu usiopangwa hutangazwa kwa mifumo otomatiki kwa kutumia lugha mbalimbali zikiwemo Kihispania, Kiingereza, Kifaransa, Kiarabu na Kijapanisi.

column1: English: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. = Swahili: Pia hakuna sharti kwamba upate nambari ya kienyeji kutoka kwa jamii unakoishi; unaweza kupata unganisho la mtandao wa satelaiti kwenye porini ya Chicken, Alaska na uchague nambari inayodai uko katika Arizona yenye jua. ### English: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). = Swahili:
column2: Njia dhahiri ya kusafiri katika daraja la kwanza au kibiashara ni kutoa pesa nyingi kwa fursa hiyo (au, bora zaidi, kufanya kampuni yako ikulipie).
column3: Jambo la wazi la kupanda ndege ya kwanza au ya biashara ni kutoa fedha nyingi kwa ajili ya haki hiyo (au, bora zaidi, kupata kampuni yako iifanye kwa ajili yako).

column1: English: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. = Swahili: Nyambizi zilitumiwa katika vita vya pili vya dunia. column2: Hakuna ilani ya tsunami iliyotolewa, na kulingana na uwakala wa jeofizikia wa Jakarta, hakuna ilani ya tsunami itakayotolewa kwani mtetemeko haukufikia ukubwa unaohitajika wa 6.5.

column1: English: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. = Swahili: Eneo la Uturuki huifanya kuwa nchi ya 37 kwa ukubwa duniani, na ina takriban saizi za Ufaransa ya Uropa na Uingereza kwa pamoja. ### English: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes. = Swahili:

column1: English: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism. = Swahili: Hata hivyo, mnamo Juni 1956, ahadi za Kruschev ziliwekwa katika jaribio wakati maandamano katika Polandi, ambapo wafanyakazi walikuwa wakipinga upungufu wa chakula na kukatwa kwa mishahara, yaligeuka kuwa maandamano ya jumla dhidi ya Ukomunisti. ### English: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. = Swahili:

column1: English: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court. = Swahili: Haijulikani kwa wakati huu ni mashtaka gani yatawekwa au ni kipi kilielekeza mamlaka kwa mvulana huyo lakini kesi ya vijana imeanza katika mahakama ya shirikisho. ### English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology. = Swahili:

column1: English: People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests. = Swahili: Watu wenye aina hii ya kufikiria wana mawazo ya kimantiki, wanaweza kukariri miundo, kutatua shida na kufanya majaribio ya kisayansi. ### English: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society. = Swahili:

column1: English: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. = Swahili: Kila mwaka karibu Oktoba wala-mimea milioni 1.5 husafiri kuelekea nyanda za kusini, na kuvuka Mto Mara, kutoka vilima vya kaskazini kwa ajili ya mvua. ### English: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25. = Swahili:

column1: English: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. = Swahili: Sanskrit ni lugha ya kale na inaweza kulinganishwa na lugha ya Kilatini inayozungumzwa Uropa. ### English: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. = Swahili:

column1: English: Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. = Swahili: Nafasi katika maeneo maarufu zaidi, kama vile Bright Angel Campground karibu na Phantom Ranch, kwa jumla hujaa kwa maombi yanayopokewa siku ya kwanza yanapofunguliwa kwa uhifadhi. ### English: The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. = Swahili:

column1: English: What is a cell?
