column2: Leo Wasámi wengi hufanya kazi katika biashara za kisasa. Utalii ni wa mapato muhimu katika Sápmi, eneo la Sámi.
column3: Leo, wengi wa Sámi hufanya kazi katika biashara za kisasa. Utalii ni muhimu kwa mapato ya Sápmi, eneo la Sámi.

column1: English: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. = Swahili: Ukitaka kujua kutupa bumarengi inayorudi kwa mkono yako, hakikisha uko na bumerang’i sahihi itakayorudi. ### English: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form. = Swahili:
column2: Pia bila shaka inafanya kusoma rahisi, ingawa kuandika kwa kiasi fulani ni ngumu kwa haja ya kutaka kujua kama kitenzi au kivumishi kinatumika kwa umuhimu.
column3: Pia inavyoonekana kwa kiasi fulani, inaboresha kusoma, lakini kuandika ni kuchanganya kidogo kwa sababu ya kubaini kama neno la kitenzi au la kutamka linatumika katika muundo wa kitenzi.

column1: English: The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool. = Swahili: Kikao kinaweza kuwa kwenye jumba nzee la kihistoria lililo na vyombo vya kale, uwanja wenye nyasi zilizokatwa vizuri na bwawa la kuogelea. ### English: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland. = Swahili:
column2: Greenland ilikuwa na watu chache. Katika Norse sagas wanasema kwamba Erik aliye Mwekundu alifukuzwa kutoka Iceland kwa mauaji, na wakati wa kusafiri Magharibi zaidi, aliipata Greenland na kuiita Greenland.
column3: Greenland ilikuwa na watu wachache sana. Katika mashairi ya Norse, wanasema kwamba Erik the Red alikuwa amefukuzwa kutoka Iceland kwa mauaji, na wakati akielekea magharibi, aligundua Greenland na kuitaja Greenland.

column1: English: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances. = Swahili: Tabia za kijeshi za Milki ya Kirumi zilisaidia sana kwa maendeleo ya matibabu. ### English: Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air. = Swahili:
column2: Sehemu kubwa ya maisha ya familia ya Kiebrania ilifanyikia nje.
column3: Jambo kubwa la maisha ya familia ya Wayahudi yalitokea nje.

column1: English: No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. = Swahili: Hakuna majeraha makubwa yaliyoripotiwa, lakini angalau watu watano katika eneo wakati wa mlipuko huo walitibiwa kwa dalili za mshtuko. ### English: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. = Swahili:
column2: Vichupa milioni kadhaa vya chanjo ya uvimbe wa ubongo vimeahidiwa na serikali, ambavyo vitasaidia kuandaa mawakala wa afya kwa mwaka ujao.
column3: Milioni kadhaa ya vidonge vya chanjo ya homa ya ubongo vimeahidiwa na serikali, ambavyo vitasaidia kuwaandaa mashirika ya afya kwa mwaka ujao.

column1: English: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. = Swahili: Kawaida kwa Norwei kuwa na vilango-bahari vyenye miinuko mikali na mabonde ambayo ghafla hugeuka kuwa kilima kirefu tambarare ambacho ni bapa, kwa kadiri fulani. ### English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected. = Swahili:
column2: Jisikie huru kuandika kwa penseli alama zako, lakini kumbuka alama za kuinama zilizochapwa ziko kwa sababu ya kimziki, kwa hivyo yafaa ziheshimiwe.
column3: Tafadhali chagua alama yako mwenyewe, lakini fikiria kuwa alama zilizotungwa kwa ajili ya muziki, hivyo zinalazimika kutumiwa.

column1: English: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area. = Swahili: Idadi ni mkusanyiko wa viumbehai wa spishi maalum ndani ya eneo fulani la kijiografia. ### English: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. = Swahili:
column2: Mtetemeko wastani wa ardhi ulitikisa Montana magharibi saa 4 na dakika 8 usiku wa Jumatatu.
column3: Kulikua na tetemeko la wastani la ardhi katika magharibi mwa Montana mnamo saa 10:08 usiku wa Jumatatu.

column1: English: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. = Swahili: Hosteli iliporomoka katika Makka, mji mtakatifu wa Kiislamu takriban saa 4 asubuhi ya leo saa za ndani. ### English: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately. = Swahili:
column2: Hata hivyo, watu wanaofahamu Kihispania kidogo wanaweza kuhitimisha kwa haraka kuwa Kireno kinakaribiana sana na kwamba hakihitaji kusomwa kando.
column3: Hata hivyo, watu wanaofahamu kidogo lugha ya Kihispania wanaweza haraka kuamini kuwa lugha ya Kihispania ni karibu sana na ya Kiitaliano, hivyo haina haja ya kuifanyia utafiti.

column1: English: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. = Swahili: Karibu karne ya 15, Estonia kaskazini ilikuwa chini ya ushawishi mkubwa wa kiutamaduni wa Ujerumani. ### English: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. = Swahili:
column2: Mabondia wenzake pia walimuombeleza Luna.
column3: Wapambanaji wengine pia walilipia heshima kwa Luna.

column1: English: Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. = Swahili: Kwa hivyo, idhini ya kurudi nchini kwa tarehe yoyote ya kuanza mwezi Mei inapatikana mnamo tarehe 1 Januari. ### English: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. = Swahili:
column2: Ingawa ujenzi wa piramidi kwa mawe uliendelea hadi mwishoni mwa Ufalme Mzee, piramidi za Giza hazikuwahi kupitwa katika saizi yazo na ubora wa kiufundi wa ujenzi wazo.
column3: Hata hivyo, ujenzi wa piramidi kwa kutumia mawe ulifanywa hadi mwisho wa Ufalme wa Kale, piramidi za Giza hazikupita katika ukubwa na ubora wa ujenzi wake.

column1: English: At 1:15 a.m. Saturday, according to witnesses, the bus was going through a green light when the car made a turn in front of it. = Swahili: Mnamo saa 1 na dakika 15 asubuhi, Jumamosi, kulingana na mashahidi, basi lilikuwa linakiuka taa ya kijani wakati gari lililokuwa mbele yake liligueka. ### English: Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. = Swahili:
column2: Kasablanka ni mojawapo ya mahali pa kuvutia kidogo zaidi kununua vitu katika Moroko yote.
column3: Casablanca ni moja ya maeneo machache machache ya kununua bidhaa katika nchi nzima ya Moroko.

column1: English: Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. = Swahili: Tiketi nyingi zinazouzwa mtandaoni kupitia tovuti za minada kama eBay au Craiglist ni zilizotumika kidogo za siku nyingi za kutembelea mbuga nyingi. ### English: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. = Swahili:
column2: Amri ya Kimkakati ya Marekani ya ofisi ya Idara ya Ulinzi ya Marekani inafuatilia vifusi.
column3: Ofisi ya U.S. Department of Defense ya U.S. Strategic Command inatafakari mabaki.

column1: English: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw. = Swahili: Hiyo inammanisha kuwa kila kitu kinafaa kurejeshwa, “alisema mtafiti katika Huduma ya Utafiti wa Bonde la Ufa Ethiopia na mwandishi mwenza wa utafiti huo, Berhane Asfaw. ### English: According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! = Swahili:
column2: Kwa mujibu wa usimamizi wa mbuga, kaa walau yadi/mita 100 mbali na dubu na mbwa mwitu na yadi/mita 25 kutoka kwa wanyama mwitu wengine wote!
column3: Kwa mujibu wa mamlaka za hifadhi, usitembee zaidi ya mita 100/yardi 100 kutoka kwa mbwa na mamba na mita 25/yardi 25 kutoka kwa wanyama wengine wote!

column1: English: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya. = Swahili: Amerika inasema imepokea habari kutoka kwa chanzo kisicho wazi ambacho kinataja haswa matumizi ya walipuaji mabomu wa kujitolea mhanga kulipua "alamardhi maarufu" nchini Ethiopia na Kenya. ### English: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others. = Swahili:
column2: Siri ya mafanikio yao ni dhana ya niche, kazi maalum ambayo kila paka anashikilia na inayomzuia kushindana na wengine.
column3: Kile chenye mafanikio kwao ni dhana ya nafasi, kazi maalumu ambayo kila mnyama huyo anayo ambayo inazuia kuishindana na wengine.

column1: English: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others. = Swahili: Mawasiliano mengi ya kisolandanifu huchochea muda wa kutafakari na kuitikia wengine. ### English: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations. = Swahili:
column2: Mnamo 1624, kampuni ya Dutch East India ilianzisha msingi kusini magharibi mwa Taiwan, kuanzisha mabadiliko katika mazoea ya uzalishaji wa nafaka na kuwaajili wafanyakazi wa Kichina kufanya kazi kwenye mashamba ya mpunga na sukari.
column3: Katika mwaka wa 1624, Kampuni ya Kijapani ya Mashariki ya Kati ilianzisha kituo katika kusini magharibi mwa Taiwan, na kuanzisha mabadiliko katika uzalishaji wa nafaka za asili na kutumia wafanyakazi wa Kichina kufanya kazi kwenye mashamba ya mpunga na sukari.

column1: English: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year. = Swahili: Miaka 250 baadaye, Guinness imekua kuwa biashara ya kimataifa ambayo hupata mauzo ya yuro bilioni 10 (dola bilioni 14.7 za Marekani) kila mwaka. ### English: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. = Swahili:
column2: Baada ya matokeo kuingia, Gingrich alimpongeza Santorum, lakini alikuwa na maneno makali kwa Romney, ambaye matangazo hasi ya kampeni yalipeperushwa kwa niaba yake dhidi ya Gingrich.
column3: Baada ya matokeo kutangazwa, Gingrich alikubali ushindi wa Santorum, lakini alionya kwa Romney, ambaye kampeni zake za kupotosha zilirushwa katika jimbo la Iowa dhidi ya Gingrich.

column1: English: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. = Swahili: Mnamo Jumatano, Ushirika wa Kitaifa wa Mpira wa Kikapu wa Marekani (NBA) ulisimamisha kipindi chake cha mpira wa kikapu wa kitaalamu kwa sababu ya wasiwasi kuhusu COVID-19. ### English: Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms). = Swahili:
column2: Safari za baharini za Mtakatifu Petersburge hujumuisha muda wa mjini. Abiria hawa wameepushwa na mahitaji ya visa (angalia masharti).
column3: Safari za baharini za Saint Petersburg zinaangazia muda wa kukaa mjini. Wasafiri wa baharini wanaruhusiwa kutozwa kodi ya visa (tazama masharti).

column1: English: The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap. = Swahili: Kibali cha Angkor kinahitajika ili kuingia katika hekalu kwa hivyo usisahau kubeba pasipoti yako unapoelekea Tonle Sap. ### English: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. = Swahili:
column2: Mwezi uliopita Iran iliona janga la hewani baya zaidi kwa miaka wakati ndege iliyokuwa ikielekea Amenia ilianguka na kuwaua watu wote 168.
column3: Mwezi uliopita Iran ilishuhudia ajali mbaya ya ndege katika miaka mingi wakati ndege iliyokuwa inakwenda Armenia ikatumbukia, na kuua watu 168 waliokuwa ndani yake.

column1: English: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements. = Swahili: Wakoloni, walipoona shughuli hii, pia waliita wasaidizi. ### English: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. = Swahili:
column2: Ukitembelea maeneo ya Aktiki na Antaktiki msimu wa baridi utapata tajriba ya usiku wa pola, ambayo ina maana kuwa jua halichomozi juu ya upeo wa macho.
column3: Kama unatembelea maeneo ya Arctic au Antarctic katika majira ya baridi, utashuhudia jua la nyakati za baridi, ambalo maana yake ni kwamba jua halipo juu ya mstari wa ikweta.

column1: English: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. = Swahili: Kwa sababu simu hupitishwa kwenye intaneti, huhitaji kutumia kampuni ya simu iliyo mahali unakoishi au unakosafiri. ### English: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles. = Swahili:
column2: Nadharia hii inasema kuwa dutu nyingi yenye giza inayozingira galaksi iko karibu na galaksi kwa aina ya mwangaza, na inatengenezwa kwa chembechembe nyingi ndogo.
column3: Hapo nadharia hii inasema kuwa most dark matter around a galaxy ni iko katika kind of halo, na ni made of lots of small particles.

column1: English: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE. = Swahili: Alexander, kama mfalme, alijitolea kugharimia ujenzi upya wa hekalu, lakini toleo lake lilikataliwa. Baadaye, baada ya Alexander kufa, hekalu lilijengwa upya mnamo 323 BCE. ### English: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership. = Swahili:
column2: Hata hivyo, mfumo wa kitaifa wa barabara hufai kiuchumi kwa magari machache tu, kwa hivyo mbinu mpya za uzalishaji zinakuzwa ili kupunguza gharama ya umiliki wa magari.
column3: Hata hivyo, mtandao wa barabara wa kitaifa hauwezi kuwa endelevu kwa idadi ndogo ya magari, hivyo njia mpya za uzalishaji zinatengenezwa kupunguza gharama za umiliki wa gari.

column1: English: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile. = Swahili: Wanyamapori wanaweza kuwa wenye aibu au wakali. Mazingira yanaweza kuwa baridi, joto, au makali kwa vinginevyo. ### English: This term derives from ancient familiarity with Bed-bugs, which are insects highly adapted to parasitize humans. = Swahili:
column2: Nenohili limetoka kwenye kufahamiana kwa kale na Kunguni, ambao wana ustadi mkubwa wa kumelea binadamu.
column3: Jina hili linatokana na uzoefu wa zamani wa kutembelea nyigu za kifaru, ambao ni wadudu walio na uwezo mkubwa wa kujilisha kwa binadamu.

column1: English: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. = Swahili: Huku uchumi wa San Francisco ukiunganishwa nayo kuwa kivutio cha watalii cha kimataifa, uchumi wake ni mseto. ### English: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world. = Swahili:
column2: Nyingi za tamaduni zinazozunguka likizo zimesilikwa pia na wasioamini katika nchi za Kikristo na wasio Wakristo duniani kote.
column3: Baadhi ya mila zinazozunguka sherehe hii zimepokelewa pia na wasioamini katika nchi za Kiislamu na wasio Wakristo kote duniani.

column1: English: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. = Swahili: Hosteli hushughulikia vijana kimsingi - mgeni wa kawaida ana miaka ishirini hivi - lakini mara nyingi unaweza kuwapata wasafiri wazee huko pia. ### English: Farther south is Niagara Falls and the north is home to the untapped natural beauty of the Muskoka and beyond. = Swahili:
column2: Mbali zaidi upande wa kusini ni Maporomoko ya Maji ya Niagara na upande wa kaskazini ni kiini cha urembo usiyofichwa cha Muskoka na zaidi.
column3: Kilele cha kusini ni Niagara Falls na kaskazini ni nyumbani kwa utajiri wa asili ya mapumziko ya Muskoka na zaidi.

column1: English: General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping. = Swahili: Jenerali James Ewing angewachukua wanamgambo 700 na kuvuka mto huko Kivukio cha Trenton, kutwaa kwa nguvu daraja iliyoko juu ya Asunpink Creek na kuwazuia wanamgambo wowote adui kutoroka. ### English: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century. = Swahili:
column2: Staili ya Kigothi ilifikia kilele katika kipindi kati ya karne za 10-11 na karne ya 14.
column3: Ufinyanzi wa Gothic ulikua katika kipindi kati ya karne ya 10 - 11 na karne ya 14.

column1: English: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. = Swahili: Kwa matembezi ya mchana kando ya njia rahisi maandalizi kidogo yanahitajika, na mtu yeyote aliye na usawa wastani wa kimwili anaweza kufurahia. ### English: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. = Swahili:
column2: Kinywaji kimoja cha kingamwili, ZMapp, hapo awali kilionyesha ahadi uwanjani, lakini tafiti rasmi zilionyesha kilikuwa na faida kidogo kuliko ilivyotafutwa katika kuzuia kifo.
column3: Kitu kimoja cha cocktail cha maboksi, ZMapp, kilionyesha matumaini katika eneo hilo, lakini tafiti rasmi zilionyesha kuwa haina faida kubwa kuliko ile iliyokusudiwa katika kuzuia kifo.

column1: English: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. = Swahili: Nyumbani, kwa sababu ya kuwa kwenye viini vya ndani kila wakati, kuna uwezekano mkubwa kwamba tayari una kinga dhidi yavyo. ### English: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds. = Swahili:
column2: Matumizi ya video za kurekodi imesababisha uvumbuzi muhimu katika tafsiri ya sauti ndogo, kusongeshwa kwa uso ambao hudumu sekunde ndogo kadhaa.
column3: Matumizi ya kurekodi video yamechangia kwa kiasi kikubwa katika kugundua mambo muhimu katika kuelewa ishara ndogo za kiakili, ishara ndogo za kiakili ambazo huonekana kwa muda mfupi tu.

column1: English: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. = Swahili: Marekebisho yaliyopendekezwa tayari yalipitia nyumba zote mbili mnamo 2011 ### English: Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. = Swahili:
column2: Vingi vya visiwa vidogo ni mataifa huru, au vinahusishwa na Ufaransa, na vinajulikana kama vituo vya mapumziko vya pwani.
column3: Visiwa vingi vidogo vina nchi huru, au vinahusiana na Ufaransa, na kuitwa mapumziko ya kifahari ya bahari.

column1: English: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation. = Swahili: Wanasayansi huita mchakato huu "utoaji wa mionzi uliosisimuliwa" kwani atomu husisimuliwa na mwanga mkali, na kusababisha utoaji wa fotoni ya mwanga, na mwanga ni aina ya mionzi. ### English: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world. = Swahili:
column2: Ajentina inajulikana vizuri kwa kuwa na mojawapo ya timu na wachezaji bora wa polo ulimweguni.
column3: Argentina ni maarufu kwa kuwa na timu bora ya mpira wa ngumi na wachezaji duniani.

column1: English: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. = Swahili: Wiki chache zilizopita, baada ya taarifa iliyochapishwa na mwanahabari Makis Triantafylopoulos kwenye kipindi chake maarufu cha televisheni "Zoungla" katika Alpha TV, mbunge na Mwanasheria, Petros Mantouvalos alifanywa kujiuzulu kwani memba wa ofisi yake walikuwa wamehusika katika hongo haramu na ufisadi. ### English: He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games. = Swahili:
column2: Hakuweza kunywa dawa zinazohitajika kutuliza maumivu yake kwani zimepigwa marufuku katika Michezo.
column3: Amekuwa akishindwa kuchukua dawa zinazohitajika kupambana na maumivu yake kwa sababu haziruhusiwi katika Michezo.

column1: English: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. = Swahili: Yesu aliyekuwa na umri wa miaka 21 alijiunga na Manchester City Januari mwaka uliopita 2017 kutoka klabu cha Kibrazili Palmeiras kwa ada iliyoripotiwa kuwa dola milioni 27. ### English: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). = Swahili:
column2: Pia wanaweza kukuwekea uhifadhi iwapo unahitaji muda wa kufikiria kuhusu ofa hiyo au kupata hati nyingine za mahali unapokwenda (k.m. visa).
column3: Wanaweza pia kutunza cheti cha ukomo wako kama unahitaji muda wa kutafakari ofa au kupata nyaraka nyingine kwa ajili ya mwaliko wako (kwa mfano, visa).

column1: English: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things. = Swahili: Hili ni jambo ambalo unahitaji kukumbuka kila wakati, ili kuepuka kukata tamaa au hata kuchukizwa na njia za kawaida za kufanya mambo. ### English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. = Swahili:
column2: Si jambo la kuaibikia: si tofauti sana na hofu ya kibinafsi na isiyopenda vitu vingine ambayo watu wengi wako nayo.
column3: Hilo si jambo la kujisikia aibu: ni tofauti na hofu binafsi na hasira za mambo mengine mengi ambayo watu wengi wanayo.

column1: English: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. = Swahili: Fikiria, ukitaka, Mmankunia, Mbostonia, Mjamaika, na Msydney wakiwa wameketi wamezunguka meza wakila chajio mkahawani katika Toronto. ### English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. = Swahili:

column1: English: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area. = Swahili: Kwa wakati huo, takriban wakaazi 100 waliokolewa kutoka kwenye eneo hilo. ### English: The Giza Plateau, or "Giza Necropolis" in the Egyptian Valley of the Dead contains several pyramids (of which the great pyramid is the largest), several small tombs, several temples, and the great Sphinx. = Swahili:

column1: English: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place. = Swahili: Mawingu yalitoa uwezekano wa mkanganyiko kuhusu kama mlipuko halisi ulifanyika. ### English: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago. = Swahili:

column1: English: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. = Swahili: Kwa ujumla, kukaa kwenye nchi ya kigeni kwa muda mrefu zaidi kunahitaji upate visa mapema. ### English: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned. = Swahili:
column2: Tafsiri nyingi za udhibitisho wa kiteknolojia zinashirikisha maoni mawili ya jumla: kwamba maendeleo ya teknolojia yenyewe hufuata njia zaidi ya ushawishi wa kitamaduni au kisiasa, na teknolojia hiyo kwa upande ina "athari" kwa jamii ambazo ni za asili, badala ya hali ya kijamii.
column3: Maudhui mengi yaDeterminism ya Teknolojia yanashirikiana na mawazo mawili makuu: kwamba maendeleo ya teknolojia yenyewe yanakielekea njia nyingi zisizo na ushawishi wa kisiasa au utamaduni, na kwamba teknolojia kwa upande mwingine ina "maoni" juu ya jamii ambazo ni za asili, badala ya kuathiriwa na mazingira ya kijamii.

column1: English: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. = Swahili: Mamlaka ilisema machache kirasmi zaidi ya kuthibitisha ukamataji wa leo. ### English: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely). = Swahili:

column1: English: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W. = Swahili: Fred ndicho kimbunga cha kitropiki chenye nguvu zaidi kuwahi kurekodiwa kusini na mashariki katika Atlantiki kufikia sasa tangu ujio wa picha za setalaiti, na kimbunga kikuu cha tatu tu katika rekodi mashariki mwa 35° Magharibi. ### English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before. = Swahili:

column1: English: San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese. = Swahili: San Francisco pia ni mojawapo ya mahali bora nchini kwa vyakula vya Kiasia: Korea, Thai, India, na Japani. ### English: The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. = Swahili:
column2: Msururu wa majengo yanayojenga wingu la Hong Kong umeoanishwa na chati ya baa inayopendeza na ambayo yamkini imeundwa kwa uwepo wa maji ya Bandari ya Viktoria.
column3: Maonyesho ya majengo ambayo yanatengeneza mstari wa Hong Kong yamepangwa kama mchoro wa baridi unaochanganywa na maji ya Victoria Harbour.

column1: English: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University). = Swahili: MRI ni ya msingi wa fizikia inayoitwa nyuklia mwangwi wa sumaku (NMR), ambayo iligunduliwa katika 1930s na Felix Bloch (anayefanya kazi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford) na Edward Purcell (kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Harvard). ### English: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation. = Swahili:
column2: Mabadiliko huongeza tofauti za kimaumbile, na uchaguzi huyaondoa katika mkusanyiko wa tofauti zilizoonyeshwa.
column3: Mabadiliko yanatoa aina mpya za mabadiliko ya kijenetiki, na chaguo linaondoa kutoka katika ziwa la mabadiliko yanayotolewa.

column1: English: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs. = Swahili: Sikhs huiita dini yao Gurmat, ambayo ni Kipunjabi kwa "njia ya guru". Guru ni kipengele msingi cha dini zote za India lakini Ukalasinga umechukua umuhimu ambao hubuni msingi wa imani za Kalasinga. ### English: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. = Swahili:
column2: Kwa kawaida kozi itachukua siku 2-5 na itahusisha uigizaji, huduma nyingi za kwanza na wakati mwingine mafunzo ya kutumia silaha.
column3: Kazi ya kawaida itakuwa kutoka siku 2-5 na itahusisha michezo, huduma nyingi za kwanza na mara nyingine mafunzo ya silaha.

column1: English: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. = Swahili: Eneo la Uturuki huifanya kuwa nchi ya 37 kwa ukubwa duniani, na ina takriban saizi za Ufaransa ya Uropa na Uingereza kwa pamoja. ### English: He arrived in the US with 4 cents to his name, a book of poetry, and a letter of recommendation from Charles Batchelor (his manager in his previous job) to Thomas Edison. = Swahili:
column2: Aliwasili Marekani na peni 4 tu, kitabu cha mashairi, na barua ya kupendekeza kutoka kwa Charles Batchelor (meneja wake katika ajira yake ya awali) kwa Thomas Edison.
column3: Alikuja Marekani akiwa na senti 4 tu, kitabu cha mashairi, na barua ya kumtambulisha kwa Thomas Edison kutoka kwa Charles Batchelor (manager wake katika kazi yake ya awali).

column1: English: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry. = Swahili: Sekta muhimu kwa Wavenezuela ni mafuta, ambapo nchi hiyo ni wauzaji nje, ingawa ni asilimia moja tu wanaofanya kazi katika sekta ya mafuta. ### English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research. = Swahili:
column2: Haiko peke yake hata hivyo, majaribio, na jaribio ni upimaji ambao hutumiwa kuondoa nadharia moja au mbili zinazowezekana, kuuliza maswali, na kufanya uchunguzi pia huongoza utafiti wa kisayansi.
column3: Hata hivyo, majaribio, na majaribio ni jaribio linalotumika kuondoa moja au zaidi ya uwezekano wa dhana, maswali, na uchunguzi pia hutumika kuongoza utafiti wa kisayansi.

column1: English: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. = Swahili: Ikiwa kupiga picha ya kitu tu hakuruhusiwi, basi hupaswi hata kufikiria kurekodi video yake. ### English: Ottawa is Canada's charming, bilingual capital and features an array of art galleries and museums that showcase Canada's past and present. = Swahili:
column2: Ottawa na jij la Kanada linalovutia na la jozilugha, na huwa na msururu wa vyumba vya sanaa na nyumba za maonyesho zinazosheheni historia ya Kanada ya zamani na ya sasa.
column3: Ottawa ni mji wa Canada wenye mvuto, unaojulikana kama mji wa lugha mbili na unaojulikana kwa kuwa na idadi kubwa ya makumbusho na galeries zinazoonyesha historia na utamaduni wa Canada.

column1: English: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. = Swahili: Kisha tena kurudi kaskazini kupitia magharibi, na kuvuka mto Mara mara nyingine tena, baada ya mvua karibu Aprili. ### English: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. = Swahili:
column2: Mwanzoni alikuwa amelazwa kwenye Hospitali ya James Paget katika Great Yarmouth.
column3: Alipelekwa kwanza hospitali katika Hospitali ya James Paget huko Great Yarmouth.

column1: English: Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). = Swahili: Watu wengi huhifadhi nafasi zao mapema sana (kwani kwa kawaida boti hizo hujaa wakati wa msimu wenye shughuli nyingi). ### English: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying." = Swahili:
column2: Mtu aliyekuwa akifanya kazi karibu na gereji iliyo karibu na eneo la ajali hiyo alisema: "Kulikuwa na watoto waliokuwa wakisubiri kuvuka barabara na wote walikuwa wakipiga mayowe na kulia."
column3: Mtu anayefanya kazi katika garasi karibu na eneo la ajali alisema: "Kikosi cha watoto kilikuwa kikijificha ili kuvuka barabara na walikuwa wote wakiimba na kuumizwa."

column1: English: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. = Swahili: Nyota hutoa mwangaza na joto kwa sababu ya nishati inayotengenezwa wakati atomu za hidrojeni zinapochanganywa (au kuunganishwa) pamoja ili kuunda elementi nzito. ### English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment. = Swahili:
column2: Watoto kama hao huitwa "katili" au jeuri. Watoto wengine katili wamefungwa na watu (kwa kawaida wazazi wao wenyewe); katika hali nyingine huu kuachwa kwa watoto kulitokana na wazazi kukataa upungufu mkubwa wa kiakili au mwili kwa mtoto.
column3: Watoto hawa hupewa jina la "wale" au "wild". Wale watoto kadhaa wamewekwa kizuizini na watu (habari zaidi, mara nyingi ni wazazi wao wenyewe); katika baadhi ya matukio, hali hii ya watoto kutengwa na wazazi wao ilikuwa ni matokeo ya wazazi kutojali watoto walio na ulemavu wa akili au mwili.

column1: English: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. = Swahili: Mahali pa ajali palipatikana leo na ni mahali pasipofikika kabisa hivi kwamba polisi wawili walishushwa msituni ili watembee waende kwenye eneo la tukio na kutafuta walionusurika. ### English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group. = Swahili:

column3: Wanachama wa timu za vitu mara nyingi hufanya kazi kama kiunganishi kwa kundi lao la karibu.

column1: English: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. = Swahili: Ugonjwa wenye maambukizi ni ule unaosababishwa na pathojeni, kama vile kirusi, bakteria, kuvu au vimelea wengine. ### English: Elements like calcium and potassium are considered metals. Of course, there are also metals like silver and gold. = Swahili:
column2: Elementi kama Kalsiamu na Potasiamu huwa zinachukuliwa kama vyuma. kwa kweli kuna vyuma vingine kama fedha na dhahabu .
column3: Elementi kama vile kalsiamu na potasiamu hushikilia nafasi ya metali. Kwa hakika, kuna pia metali kama vile shaba na dhahabu.

column1: English: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. = Swahili: Vita kwa Ufaransa vikiwa vimekwisha, Ujerumani ilianza kujitayarisha kuvamia kisiwa cha Uingereza. ### English: While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. = Swahili:

column1: English: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial". = Swahili: Usafirishaji wa joto uliofikia inchi 6.34 kwenye geji katika Oahu, ulielezewa kuwa na “ faida”. ### English: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300). = Swahili:

column3: Jina la kipindi ambapo matukio hayo yalitokea ni kawaida kuitwa kipindi cha Kati-Kubwa, kipindi cha historia ya Ulaya katika karne ya 11, 12 na 13 (AD 1000-1300).

column1: English: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. = Swahili: Muda mfupi baadaye, Jarida la Atlanta-Katiba lilichapisha ripoti kuonyesha shida za matokeo ya vipimo. ### English: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland. = Swahili:

column1: English: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you. = Swahili: Hata ikiwa unaendesha kupitia msitu wa mvua wa kitropiki ndogo, sekunde chache milango ikiwa wazi unapoingia kwenye gari ni muda unaotosha kwa mbu kuingia na wewe garini. ### English: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. = Swahili:
column2: Perry alisema, "Nitarudi Texas ili kutathmini matokeo ya mkutano wa usiku wa leo, kuamua kama kuna njia yangu ya kusonga mbele katika mbio hizi", lakini baadaye akasema kwamba angebaki kwenye mbio na kushindana katika uchaguzi wa msingi wa Carolina Kusini mnamo Januari 21.
column3: Perry alisema kuwa atarejea Texas ili kupima matokeo ya caucus ya usiku huu, kubaini kama kuna njia ya mbele kwa mimi katika mbio hizi, lakini baadaye alisema kuwa atabaki katika mbio hizi na kushindana katika uchaguzi wa Januari 21 wa South Carolina.

column1: English: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. = Swahili: Katika nchi zilizoendelea leo, kuandaa kitanda cha deluksi na kiamshakinywa imeimarishwa kwa aina fulani ya kisanaa. ### English: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin. = Swahili:

column1: English: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e". = Swahili: Kibao hakikuharibiwa; ugeuzi ulifanywa kutumia maturubai meusi yaliyopambwa kwa ishara za amani na moyo ili kubadilisha “O” kusomeka kama “e” ndogo. ### English: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. = Swahili:

column1: English: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. = Swahili: Mamlaka ilisema machache kirasmi zaidi ya kuthibitisha ukamataji wa leo. ### English: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. = Swahili:

column1: English: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light". = Swahili: Sehemu ya nje tunayoona tunapotazama jua inaitwa photosphere, kumaanisha “mpira wa mwanga”. ### English: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island. = Swahili:
column2: Taiwan ilianza nyuma kitambo katika karne ya 15 ambapo mabaharia wa Kiingereza wanaopita hurekodi jina la kisiwa hicho kama Ilha Formosa, au kisiwa kizuri.
column3: Taiwan ilianza mapema karne ya 15 ambapo mabaharia wa Ulaya waliokuwa wakipita waliripoti jina la kisiwa hicho kama Ilha Formosa, au kisiwa chenye kuvutia.

column1: English: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. = Swahili: Mwani huo hutoa sumu ya neva ambayo inaweza kulemaza neva katika binadamu na samaki. ### English: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. = Swahili:

column1: English: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. = Swahili: Elementi na misombo zinaweza kusonga kutoka hali moja hadi nyingine na zikose kubadilika. ### English: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that. = Swahili:
column2: Blogi pia zinaweza kuimarisha uandishi wa mwanafunzi. Huku wanafunzi wakianza tajriba yao ya blogi na matatizo ya sarufi na herufi, uwepo wa hadhira kijumla hubadilisha hilo.
column3: Blogu zinaweza pia kusaidia kuboresha uandishi wa wanafunzi. Hata hivyo, wanafunzi mara nyingi huanza blogu zao kwa kutumia tata za uandishi na uchapaji, lakini uwepo wa watu wengi huweza kubadilisha hali hiyo.

column1: English: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. = Swahili: Kesi hiyo ilishtakiwa huko Virginia kwa sababu ni nyumbani kwa mtoaji mkuu wa huduma ya intaneti AOL, kampuni iliyoanzisha mashtaka hayo. ### English: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. = Swahili:
column2: Kuteleza kwa kubeba shanta: Shughuli hii pia huitwa kuteleza mashambani, kutalii kwa kuteleza au matembezi ya kuteleza.
column3: Backpacking kwa ski: Hii ni shughuli nyingine inayojulikana kama backcountry ski, ski touring au ski hiking.

column1: English: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii down under". = Swahili: Vikiwa katika eneo la saa sawa na Hawaii, wakati mwingine visiwa hivyo hufikiriwa kuwa "Hawaii ya chini kwa chini". ### English: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. = Swahili:

column1: English: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. Hekalu hili la kilimani lilijengwa mwishoni mwa karne ya 9, wakati wa utawala wa Mfalme Yasovarman. ### English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp. = Swahili:

column3: Hizi ni pamoja na kuwa na tahadhari kuwa mbu na wanyama wengine huweza kuvutiwa na harufu, hivyo usiwe na harufu ya chakula au usiwe na kambi safi.

column1: English: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . = Swahili: Katika kilele chake, Kimbunga cha Kitropiki cha Gonu, kilichopatiwa jina la begi la majani ya mtende kwa lugha ya Maldivi, kililifikia pepo imara za kilomita 240 kwa saa (maili 149 kwa saa). ### English: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. = Swahili:
column2: Kwa sababu manyoya ya dinosau hayana chimbuko uliyostawishwa vizuri, inayoitwa rachi, lakini huwa na sifa zingine za manyoya — barbu na barbule — watafiti waligundua rachi labda ni maendeleo ya baadaye ya uvumbuzi kuliko sifa hizi nyingine.
column3: Kwa sababu viwambo vya ndege wa kale havina mabawa ya vizuri sana, ambayo huitwa mkia, lakini vina viwambo vingine vya ndege — mabaka na mabaka ya mkia — watafiti walihisi kuwa mkia ulikuwa ni maendeleo ya baadaye ambayo viwambo vingine vilikuwa vimeundwa.

column1: English: For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race. = Swahili: Kwa mfano, watoto ambao wanashirikishwa na uchache wa kabila wanaodhaniwa kuwa hawafanyi vizuri shuleni huwa hawafanyi vizuri shuleni mara tu wanapogundua juu ya dhana linalohusishwa na kabila zao. ### English: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old. = Swahili:

column1: English: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card". = Swahili: Mzaliwa wa Hong Kong, Ma alisomea katika kituo kikuu cha New York na shule ya Chuo cha Sheria cha Harvard na kwa wakati mmoja alikuwa na “kadi ya kijani” ya mkazi wa kudumu wa Amerika. ### English: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. = Swahili:

column1: English: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself. = Swahili: Kiongozi mkuu wa nchi, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, ameelezea utegemeaji wa mafuta kama "mtego" ulioanza kabla ya mapinduzi ya Kiislamu ya Irani mnamo 1979 na ambao nchi inafaa kujiokoa kutokana nao. ### English: It was ruled by the "Vichy" French. column1: English: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. = Swahili: Injini za utafsiri zimeimarika sana, na sasa mara nyingi hutoa tafsiri inayokaribia usahihi (na kawaida huwa si upuzi), lakini umakini unahitajika, kwani zinaweza kuwa zimekosea kabisa. ### English: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an. = Swahili:

column1: English: Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. = Swahili: Zaidi ya meli 60 za kifahari husafiri kwenye maji ya Galapagos - zikiwa zenye saizi ya abiria 8 hadi 100. ### English: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation. = Swahili:

column1: English: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. = Swahili: Tangu kuanzishwa kwake, Onion imekuwa milki halisi ya habari za dhihaka, ikiwa na toleo la chapa, tovuti ambayo iliwavutia wageni 5,000,000 wa kipekee katika mwezi wa Oktoba, matangazo ya kibinafsi, mtandao wa habari wa saa 24, podikasti, na atlasi ya dunia iliyozinduliwa hivi majuzi inayoitwa Our Dumb World. ### English: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. = Swahili:

column1: English: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things. = Swahili: Hili ni jambo ambalo unahitaji kukumbuka kila wakati, ili kuepuka kukata tamaa au hata kuchukizwa na njia za kawaida za kufanya mambo. ### English: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. = Swahili:

column1: English: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. = Swahili: "Karatasi za Panama" ni jina la kijumla la takriban stakabadhi milioni kumi kutoka kwa Kampuni ya sheria ya Panama ya Mossack Fonseca, zilizofichuliwa kwa vyombo vya habari katika majira ya kuchipua ya 2016. ### English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. = Swahili:

column3: Ukanda wa Chaco ulikuwa nyumbani kwa makundi mengine ya makabila ya wenyeji kama vile Guaycurú na Payaguá, ambao walibaki na ufugaji, uvuvi na uuzaji wa bidhaa.

column1: English: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam. = Swahili: Wapangaji katika Lockwood Gardens wanaamini kwamba huenda kukawa na familia nyingine 40 au zaidi zitakazokabili kufukuzwa, kwani walifahamu kuwa polisi wa OHA pia wanachunguza mali nyingine za makazi katika Oakland ambazo huenda zikajipata katika sakata ya nyumba. ### English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. = Swahili:

column1: English: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. = Swahili: Mafanikio ya Vautier nje ya ukurugenzi ni pamoja na kususia chakula mnamo 1973 dhidi ya kile alichoona kama udhibiti wa kisiasa. ### English: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. column2: Kwa huzuni, kadiri mbinu mpya za kuandika zinavyotokea, ndivyo penseli inavyoshushwa kwenye hadhi na matumizi duni.
column3: Kwa bahati mbaya, kama vile mbinu mpya za kuandika zimepatikana, kalamu imeondolewa kwenye nafasi yake ya juu na matumizi yake yamepungua.

column1: English: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. = Swahili: Stardust itaweka rekodi mpya ya wakati wote kwa kuwa chombo cha angani chenye kasi ya juu zaidi kurudi Duniani, na kuvunja rekodi ya awali iliyowekwa mnamo Mai 1969 wakati wa kurudi kwa moduli ya udhibiti ya Apollo X. ### English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology. = Swahili:
column2: Maoni ya Aristotle juu ya mambo yote ya sayansiyalikubalika, ikiwemo saikolojia.
column3: Kuthibitishwa ni maoni ya Aristotle kuhusu masuala yote ya sayansi, yakiwemo saikolojia.

column1: English: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus. = Swahili: Hekalu ya Artemis kule Ephesus iliharibiwa julai 21, 356 BCE kwa kisa cha moto kilichotekelezwa na Herostratus. ### English: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them. = Swahili:
column2: Nadharia za maudhui hulenga kupata kinachowafanya watu waendelee au kinachowavutia.
column3: Teories za maudhui zinaangazia nini kinamfanya mtu ajisikie vizuri au kumpenda.

column1: English: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. = Swahili: Felicia, iliyokuwa kwa wakati mmoja dhoruba ya Kategoria ya 4kwenye kiwango cha Vimbunga cha Saffir- Simpson, ilidhoofika hadi unyongovu wa kitropiki kabla ya kufifia Jumanne. ### English: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive. = Swahili:
column2: Sisi hutengeneza nyumba zetu kwa mimea na kutengeneza nguo zetu kwa mimea. Chakula kingi ambacho sisi hula ni mimea. Bila mimea, wanyama hawawezi kuishi.
column3: Tunatengeneza nyumba zetu kutoka kwa mimea na tunatengeneza mavazi yetu kutoka kwa mimea. Kwa ujumla, vyakula vingi tunavyovyao ni mimea. Bila ya mimea, wanyama wangeishia kufa.

column1: English: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. = Swahili: Aina za Kifaransa zinazozungumzwa katika Ubelgiji na Uswizi zinatofautiana kidogo na Kifaransa kinachozungumzwa Ufaransa, ingawa zinalingana kiasi cha kueleweka baina yazo. ### English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia. = Swahili:
column2: Mechi ya mwisho ya msururu itafanyika katika Ellis Park mjini Johannesburg wiki ijayo, wakati Springboks watakapocheza dhidi ya Australia.
column3: Mchezo wa mwisho wa michuano hiyo utafanyika katika uwanja wa Ellis Park mjini Johannesburg wiki ijayo, wakati Waafrika Kusini wakipambana na Australia.

column1: English: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. = Swahili: Wiki iliyopita, Naked News ilitangaza kuwa wangeongeza sana idhini yake ya utangazaji wa Habari kwa lugha za kimataifa, na watangazaji watatu wapya. ### English: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up. = Swahili:
column2: Mojawapo ya mbinu maarufu zinatozumiwa kuonyesha umuhimu wa kushirikiana ni kutumia mifano michache sikitishi ya watoto ambao, kupitia mapuuza, mikosi, kunyanyaswa kimakusudi, hawakushirikishwa na watu wazima walipokuwa wanapokua.
column3: Mara nyingi, moja ya njia zinazotumiwa sana ili kuonyesha umuhimu wa socialization ni kutumia mifano michache ya watoto walioachwa bila kutunzwa na wazee wakati wa ukuaji wao.

column1: English: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing. = Swahili: Walakini, kuna njia nyingi za kipekee za kunywa kahawa ulimwenguni kote ambazo zinafaa kushuhudiwa. ### English: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification. = Swahili:
column2: Pesa zingeenda kwa nyumba ambazo ni sugu-kwa-mafurikowa, usimamizi bora wa maji, na mseto wa mazao.
column3: Fedha hizo zinaweza kutumika kujenga nyumba zinazokidhi matakwa ya mafuriko, kuboresha usimamizi wa maji na upanuzi wa kilimo.

column1: English: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening. = Swahili: Kufikia mapema leo, pepo zilikuwa za kilomita 83 kwa saa, na zilitarajiwa kuzidi kudhoofika. ### English: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. = Swahili:
column2: Pesa zinaweza kubadilishwa katika benki ya pekee visiwani ambayo inapatikana Stanley mkabala na duka la FIC West.
column3: Fedha zinaweza kubadilishwa katika benki pekee ya visiwa, ambayo iko katika Stanley, upande wa pili wa FIC West.

column1: English: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. = Swahili: Dkt. Lee pia alieleza wasiwasi wake kuhusu ripoti kwamba watoto katika Uturuki sasa wameambukizwa virusi vya homa ya ndege A(H5N1) bila kuugua. ### English: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures. = Swahili:
column2: Usiumbue tovuti kwa kuashiria au kukata michoro kwenye miundo.
column3: Usifanyie maboresho eneo hili kwa kuandikia au kuchoma graffiti kwenye majengo.
